column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=•
#Text=Greater interaction between councillor and community with a view to engaging the community in decisions that effect the community and ensuring top quality customer service .
#Text=Q :
#Text=What one election issue do you feel is most relevant to your ward in this election ?
#Text=A :
#Text=Intelligently managing the City 's growth with its incumbent challenges relating to real estate development , traffic congestion , and environmental pollution .
#Text=Q :
#Text=Why have you chosen to involve yourself in the political process ?
#Text=A :
#Text=We live in a very exciting time and Toronto is a very exciting place that is growing at a phenomenal rate .
#Text=I am a well rounded individual and in the prime of life , energetic and dedicated to civic duty .
#Text=I want to use my experience , knowledge , and intelligence to serve the people of Ward 25 and to engage them more fully in decisions that affect them in their community .
#Text=I also want to influence and inspire the direction of the growth of this wonderful city in a positive way .
#Text=Q :
#Text=Why do you want to represent this particular ward on council ?
#Text=A :
#Text=It is the ward in which I have lived for the past 17 years .
#Text=Q :
#Text=How are you currently involved in the community ?
#Text=A :
#Text=I have been involved in charity work with such organizations as Big Brothers , the church to which I belong , and fundraising for other health related causes .
#Text=I am a avid fan of the arts in Toronto and have volunteered with a number of community groups that provide theatre to seniors and moderate income families .
#Text=And I am past president of the Upper Canada Tenants Association .
#Text=Q :
#Text=What does Toronto mean to you ?
#Text=A :
#Text=Home Sweet Home , the greatest city in the world .
#Text=Q :
#Text=Which council decision ( since the 2003 election ) do you feel the city/your ward should be most proud of , and which was least desirable ?
#Text=A :
#Text=Most proud of :
#Text=The Toronto Green Development Standard .
#Text=It is time to put it into effect .
#Text=Least proud of : Wasteful spending habits - which impact directly on our property taxes and the City 's debt .
#Text=Q :
#Text=If you were elected as a " rookie " councillor , What would you bring to the table beyond the incumbent ?
#Text=A :
#Text=I am a man who prefers to get out into the community and meet the people and I now work very hard to do that .

#Text=It amazes me that most people I speak to in the Ward , have no idea who their representative is and have never heard from him - this , to me , is an abrogation of a councillor 's duty to her or his electorate .
#Text=I want to know their concerns , firsthand , and make every effort to provide the means by which they can communicate their concerns and also hear their suggestions for solutions .

#Text=I will forge effective partnerships with the leaders of the residential and business associations as well as representatives of the police , health and environmental bodies , religious groups , and others , in order to have their input and work together to get things done for the benefit of our community .
#Text=Furthermore , I would be a strong voice at City Council in advocating for those issues at City Hall which directly impact Ward 25 : development , taxes , solid wastes issues .
#Text=I believe the incumbent has not met the expectations of the community in these regards .

#Text=Furthermore , I have 18 years ' experience in managing a successful business working within strict budgets and tight timelines and would bring that experience to the position of City Councillor .
